footer.showroomTimings: We are open Monday to Friday 12PM-6PM and Saturdays from 9AM-12PM

home.title: Home
home.description: Discover top-quality ergonomic office furniture for your home, medium, or corporate office. Shop standing desks, ergonomic chairs, and more for a comfortable workspace.

heroSection.title: Welcome to the Next.js E-commerce Store
heroSection.description: This is a simple e-commerce store built with Next.js and Prisma.

centeredImageSection.content1: This is a centered image section.
centeredImageSection.content2: This is another centered image section.

textImageSection.text: This is a text and image section.

0.title: 24/7 Customer Service
0.paragraph: Customer service is at the heart of our values. We are always happy to listen and answer any questions you may have.

1.title: Next-Day Delivery
1.paragraph: Get your orders quickly. All orders over $99 come with free delivery within Panama City.

2.title: 7-Day Returns
2.paragraph: Not sure if the product is right for you? No problem! You have up to 7 days to return it.

3.title: Extended Warranties
3.paragraph: We believe in the quality of our products. That's why we offer extended warranties of 1 to 5 years.

login.title: Login
login.description: Access your account to manage orders, track shipments, and update your profile at our ergonomic office furniture store.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Explore our wide range of ergonomic office furniture categories. Find the perfect standing desk, ergonomic chair, and office accessories for your needs.

subcategories.title: Subcategories
subcategories.description: Dive into our subcategories to find specialized ergonomic office furniture. From standing desks to ergonomic chairs, we have everything to outfit your workspace.

products.title: Products
products.description: Browse our extensive collection of ergonomic office furniture. Find the perfect standing desk, ergonomic chair, and more to create your ideal workspace.

cart.title: Cart
cart.description: Review your selected ergonomic office furniture items in your cart. Proceed to checkout to complete your purchase and enhance your workspace.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.description: Complete your purchase of ergonomic office furniture. Secure checkout for standing desks, ergonomic chairs, and more to improve your office comfort.

cancellation.title: Cancellations and Returns
cancellation.description: Learn about our cancellation and return policy. Understand how to cancel your order for ergonomic office furniture and our terms and conditions.

delivery.title: Delivery Policy
delivery.description: Read our delivery policy for ergonomic office furniture. Get information on shipping times, delivery options, and more.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Review our privacy policy to understand how we protect your personal information while shopping for ergonomic office furniture.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: Understand the terms and conditions for purchasing ergonomic office furniture from our store. Learn about warranties, returns, and more.
